PAD_PostReunion.synopsis: Minsc and Jaheira are bickering in the camp ahead of their reunion scene - Intended as a holding pattern to draw the player's attention to them before a big happy reunion and lore moment.
PAD_PostReunion.how_to_trigger: - Rescue Minsc from the Cistern- Go to camp- See them arguing

PAD_PreReunion.synopsis: Minsc and Jaheira are bickering in the camp ahead of their reunion scene - Intended as a holding pattern to draw the player's attention to them before a big happy reunion and lore moment.
PAD_PreReunion.how_to_trigger: - Rescue Minsc from the Cistern- Go to camp- See them arguing

PAD_PostReunion_1.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_PostReunion_1.text: You can point that smug little smile somewhere else, for a start.
PAD_PostReunion_1.context: NodeContext: Still a little annoyed even though the argument is resolved, but cooling off

PAD_PostReunion_6.speaker: Minsc
PAD_PostReunion_6.text: Ah, forgive me, Jaheira. But it is just so good to be together again!

PAD_PostReunion_5.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_PostReunion_5.text: Do not get too comfortable just yet. I will want a full report - everything you learned during your time with the cult.

PAD_PostReunion_0.speaker: Minsc
PAD_PostReunion_0.text: Of course, Jaheira! I think they have something to do with illithids.

PAD_PostReunion_9.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_PostReunion_9.context: NodeContext: Giving up on her line of questioning Minsc, nows it's her fault for even trying.

PAD_PostReunion_10.speaker: Minsc
PAD_PostReunion_10.text: Jaheira... I am sorry that I was so easily blinded. There was more than the tadpole to the cult's manipulations of Minsc.

PAD_PostReunion_2.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_PostReunion_2.text: I know, old friend. They made a poor imitation at me, bossing you around.
PAD_PostReunion_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Just to build on Boo having seen Jaheira's basement - entirely meant to be a silly gag about Boo being one of Jaheira's contacts.

PAD_PostReunion_3.speaker: Minsc
PAD_PostReunion_3.text: Oh, no. I speak of how they sealed Boo away, so that he would not remind me of the man he has taught me to be.

PAD_PostReunion_4.speaker: Minsc
PAD_PostReunion_4.text: B-but - you, too, are important to Minsc!
PAD_PostReunion_4.context: NodeContext: Catching himself, realising he may have offended Jaheira.

PAD_PostReunion_8.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_PostReunion_8.text: Too late. But don't worry, I shall try to sob into a pillow tonight so as not to wake the entire city.

PAD_PreReunion_2.speaker: Minsc
PAD_PreReunion_2.text: Jaheira, Minsc has been thinking, and Boo agrees - you are owed an apology.

PAD_PreReunion_9.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_PreReunion_9.text: Oh...? I will admit, that is unexpected. Your capture by the cult has taught you something, then.
PAD_PreReunion_9.context: InternalNodeContext: Clearly having not learned his lesson

PAD_PreReunion_3.speaker: Minsc
PAD_PreReunion_3.text: Yes. Minsc should have charged in all the sooner - and brought a second sword, so that he might have cut all his captors down in one blow!

PAD_PreReunion_0.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_PreReunion_0.text: Cover the hamster's ears. I'm going to scream.

PAD_PreReunion_8.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_PreReunion_8.text: The problem, ranger, is that you charged in at all. We didn't even know what we were dealing with!
PAD_PreReunion_8.context: InternalNodeContext: Indignant. Sure it's a doppelganger and morphed into her exact copy, but she's miffed to have been imitated. And worse, the imitation believed.

PAD_PreReunion_10.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_PreReunion_10.text: We have discussed matters like this before. You recall what the better part of valour is...?

PAD_PreReunion_1.speaker: Minsc
PAD_PreReunion_1.text: Of course! Eh... it is the name of one of those thick histories you have given Minsc to read, yes?
PAD_PreReunion_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Handy chance to handwave why Boo ended up separated - He actually would have helped Minsc see through it.

PAD_PreReunion_11.speaker: Minsc
PAD_PreReunion_11.text: Now! Where is it you lay your head, so Minsc and Boo may find a spot nearby?
PAD_PreReunion_11.context: InternalNodeContext: Nothing much here, just a silly throwaway

PAD_PreReunion_4.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_PreReunion_4.text: Why don't you sidle up to the fire. Sit in it, for all I care - though leave Boo aside first.

PAD_PreReunion_7.speaker: Minsc
PAD_PreReunion_7.text: Wait. Wait. Jaheira, wait. Boo suggests... that you are unhappy about something...?

PAD_PreReunion_12.speaker: Minsc
PAD_PreReunion_12.text: You have found fine companionship while we were apart. It is no common soul with the strength of arms to best Minsc in combat.

PAD_PreReunion_6.speaker: Minsc
PAD_PreReunion_6.text: Or the strength of heart, to take his hand in friendship afterwards! Though I think this perhaps had something to do with you, yes?

PAD_PreReunion_5.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_PreReunion_5.text: Yes. And I begin to wonder if I was not over-hasty.
